attributes.action: refuse to allow the pope to visit this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man and his church have shielded child abusers and are openly homphobic, we have laws in this country to protect us from homophobic people and their views yet this man is allowed in and will be treated like royalty, if i was to spout his bile on a street corner i would be arrested

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
